EventStructure Methods

Requires: VI Scripting

Inherits from Node»Structure»MultiFrameStructure. View the class hierarchy.

MethodDescription
Get Event Data NodeGets a reference to the Event Data Node on the Event structure at the given event case index. Details
Get Event Filter NodeGets a reference to the Event Filter Node on the Event structure at the given event case index. If the event case handles a notify event, this property returns a NULL reference. Details
Get Handled EventsGets all events configured for a given frame, or event case, to handle. This method returns the events in separate outputs grouped by registration type and refnum class. Details
Set Handled EventsSets all events configured for the given the frame, or event case, to handle. Details
